results.p: Hydra, in Greek legend, a gigantic water-snake-like monster with nine heads, one of which was immortal.
The Hydra is a serpentine lake monster in Greek mythology and Roman mythology. Its lair was the lake of Lerna in the Argolid.

results.t: HYDRA | Marvel Cinematic Universe Wiki - Fandom
results.p: HYDRA was an authoritarian-subversive paramilitary global terrorist organization. It was founded in ancient times as a cult dedicated to the fanatical ...
1. a many-headed serpent or monster in Greek mythology that was slain by Hercules and each head of which when cut off was replaced by two others.
